info.description: This is the swagger specification for Market Marker API.
info.title: Market Marker API

get.description: Returns all exchange accounts for the authenticated user.
Returns a specific exchange account by its ID, for the authenticated user.

delete.description: Deletes a specific exchange account by its ID, for the authenticated user.

post.description: Refreshes the access and refresh token pair using an existing refresh token.
Generates and sends a one-time code to the specified email address.

400.description: Bad Request or invalid email format

post.description: Authenticates a user with an email and code, returning JWT access and refresh tokens.

200.description: Successful sign-in. Returns a user object and JWT info

400.description: Bad Request or invalid email format

404.description: User with this email not found

post.description: Authenticates an existing user via a Google ID token and returns JWT tokens.

200.description: Successful sign-in. Returns a user object and JWT info

post.description: Authenticates a user by verifying a signed message from their Solana wallet. If the user does not exist, a new one is created.
post.summary: Sign in or register with Solana wallet

parameters.description: Public key and signed message(base64) for verification
parameters.name: request

200.description: Successful sign-in or registration. Returns user data and JWT tokens

400.description: Bad Request (e.g., missing public key or signature)

post.description: Creates a new user by verifying an email and confirmation code.

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g., user already exists)

post.description: Creates a new user based on a Google ID token.

401.description: Email not found in locals or invalid token

500.description: Internal Server Error (e.g., user already exists)

get.description: Returns all campaigns associated with the authenticated user.
Returns a statistical summary of all campaigns for the authenticated user (e.g., total spent, active count).

patch.description: Updates configuration for a specific campaign.

delete.description: Stops an active campaign by its UUID.

get.description: Returns a list of transactions associated with a specific campaign.
Returns all projects. Page and pageSize are co-dependent optional fields: providing one requires providing the other.
Returns a project by its ID

delete.description: Deletes a project by its ID

post.description: Estimates the cost and impact of a Raydium pull operation.
Creates a new target pull-down campaign on Raydium to decrease token price.
Creates a new target pull-up campaign on Raydium to increase token price.

get.description: Returns the current tip floor information from Jito.
Returns the profile data for the user authenticated via a JWT access token.

patch.description: Updates the email address of the authenticated user. Requires a valid confirmation code sent to the new email.

400.description: Invalid request data or email format

get.description: Returns a list of actions (history) for the authenticated user.

post.description: Creates a new Solana deposit request

get.description: Returns the deposit history for the authenticated user. Page and pageSize are co-dependent optional fields: providing one requires providing the other.
Returns the deposit history for a specific project ID, owned by the authenticated user.
get.summary: Get deposit history by project ID

post.description: Processes a previously created deposit order by its ID.
Returns the current status of a deposit by its ID
Generates a specified number of new Solana wallets and associates them with project IDs.
Imports existing Solana wallets using a list of private keys.
Imports Solana wallets from a text file (.txt) containing private keys (one key per line).

parameters.description: Text file with private keys (one per line)
parameters.name: file

post.description:
Starts monitoring of provided Solana wallets or updates monitoring settings.
This endpoint allows adding wallets to the monitoring service to track their activity.

get.description: Fetches the private key for a given wallet ID.
get.summary: Get private key by wallet ID

BearerAuth.description: Type 'Bearer' followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
